Column definitions of all datasets

Source: R/data_dictionary.R
data_dictionary.Rd

This dataset provides metadata about all datasets in the package r2dii.data.

data_dictionary

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 101 rows and 4 columns.

Definitions

  • column (character): The name of a dataset-column.

  • dataset (character): The name of a dataset.

  • definition (character): The definition of a dataset-column.

  • typeof (character): The result of typeof(), one of double, integer, logical, or character..

Examples

head(data_dictionary)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 4
#>   dataset  column              typeof   definition                              
#>   <chr>    <chr>               <chr>    <chr>                                   
#> 1 ald_demo ald_emission_facto… charact… The units that the emission factor is m…
#> 2 ald_demo ald_timestamp       charact… Date at which asset data was pulled fro…
#> 3 ald_demo country_of_domicile charact… Country where company is registered     
#> 4 ald_demo emission_factor     double   Company level emission factor of the te…
#> 5 ald_demo is_ultimate_listed… logical  Flag if company is the listed ultimate …
#> 6 ald_demo is_ultimate_owner   logical  Flag if company is the ultimate parent …
